attributes.action: To change legislation to prevent the Mayor of London; to be a member or affiliate of any political party.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To change legislation to prevent the Mayor of London; to be a member or affiliate of any political party. To ensure that the Mayor and his powers are limited and answerable to the GLA, and the electorate.
To prevent the Mayor privileges to enforce totalitarian ideals and practices at his leisure.
To ensure there is no immunity from dismissal, for failure in his duties and exercises.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
